RelatedSentence: The launch follows criticism of the Government 's approach to SME grants and funding .

A1: a `` vital '' part of an information campaign o increase the level of information available to SMEs
RelatedSentence: The tool is being launched by Finance Minister Michael Noonan in Limerick this morning .

A0: a `` vital '' part of an information campaign o increase the level of information available to SMEs
RelatedSentence: It follows criticism from several small and medium enterprise industry groups over the structure and organisation of government support schemes for SMEs .
In particular , the Employment and Investment Incentive Scheme and the Microfinance Ireland funding package have attracted the ire of organisations like ISME and the Small Firms Association .

A0: Finance Minister Michael Noonan in Limerick
RelatedSentence: At the launch this morning , Noonan said that the tool is a vital part of an information campaign o increase the level of information available to SMEs .
There are some 188,600 SMEs in Ireland , but 98 per cent of owners surveyed had little awareness of public supports available to them .
